examples: a surge of ragged scruffy children
he was soiled and seedy and fragrant with gin

definitions.text: somewhat ill or prone to illness
examples: is unwell and can't come to work

definitions.text: morally degraded; ; ; ; - Seattle Weekly; - James Joyce
examples: sleazy storefronts with...dirt on the walls
the sordid details of his orgies stank under his very nostrils
the squalid atmosphere of intrigue and betrayal
